roleset.name: to treat dishonorably or unjustly

example.name: passive
example.text: When Isabella ( Ellen Lauren ) confronts her brother Claudio ( Matt Loney ) in his cell , explaining the price she has been asked to secure his freedom ; when Isabella and the disguised Duke ( Philip Kerr ) conspire to trick Angelo ; and when Mariana ( Annalee Jefferies ) , a woman wronged by Angelo , confronts him with his past misdeeds , the performers bring the dramatic high points to life with intense energy and intelligence .

roleset.note: WRONG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wrong' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from wrong.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: morally/legally bad, not as it should be

role.descr: thing that is not as it should be, morally/legally bad
attributive: wrong with regards to what/whom

example.name: both args
example.text: What is wrong with Muslims speaking up for their rights ? ? ?

propbank.arg: with Muslims speaking up for their rights

example.name: arg1
example.text: This is not because their race or culture is wrong or bad in any way , it 's simply a fact that certain groups have higher rates of crime .

example.name: concatenation of arg1
example.text: She had to come and tell Alfred that he was wrong to dribble ice cream on his clean , freshly pressed pants .

propbank.arg: to dribble ice cream on his clean , freshly pressed pants

roleset.note: WRONG-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1 (from wrong.02-j)

roleset.name: unsuited to

example.name: both args
example.text: You meet someone who seems so great ... and then , something happens : You find out he is completely wrong for you .

roleset.note: WRONG-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from wrong.03-j)

roleset.name: incorrect, inaccurate, mistaken

role.descr: inaccurate proposition, thought, wrong about what

example.name: both args
example.text: You were wrong about eating worms .

example.name: both args
example.text: I suspect you are wrong on the voting inclinations of the moderates , and especially the ones you call tea baggers .

propbank.arg: on the voting inclinations of the moderates , and especially the ones you call tea baggers

roleset.note: WRONG-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, right-j.01. (from wrong.01-j)
